meanings.definition: A group of compounds that includes caffeine and theobromine.
meanings.sent1: Methylxanthines are compounds like caffeine and theobromine.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the taste of foods containing methylxanthines like chocolate and coffee.
meanings.sent3: Why did the methylxanthines go to the party? They wanted to stay awake all night!
meanings.sent4: Her energy was like methylxanthines, keeping her alert and focused.
meanings.sent5: The methylxanthines in the drink gave him a burst of energy like never before.

meanings.definition: Chemical substances found in coffee, tea, and chocolate.
meanings.sent1: Do you know which beverages contain methylxanthines like coffee and tea?
meanings.sent2: I always feel a bit more awake after eating chocolate with methylxanthines.
meanings.sent3: The methylxanthines in the chocolate seemed to whisper, 'Eat more, stay awake!'
meanings.sent4: Her love for chocolate was like a secret affair with methylxanthines.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of coffee filled the room, carrying the scent of methylxanthines with it.

meanings.definition: Stimulant compounds that affect the central nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Doctors warn about the effects of too much methylxanthines on the nervous system.
meanings.sent2: The methylxanthines in energy drinks can make you feel more alert.
meanings.sent3: The methylxanthines partied in his brain, waking up every nerve!
meanings.sent4: Her excitement bubbled up like a pot of boiling methylxanthines.
meanings.sent5: The methylxanthines raced through his body, electrifying every cell with energy.
